import React from 'react'; import "./Blog.css"; import { Container, Row, Col, Table } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import DocumentMeta from "react-document-meta"; function DifferenceMbbsInUkraineVsIndia() { const meta = { title: "Difference of Studying MBBS in Ukraine Vs India for Indian Students", description: "Difference of Studying MBBS in Ukraine Vs India for Indian Students by Medical Universities, Cost of Education, Advantage of Countries, Cost Living, PG after MBBS & Scope of Abroad MBBS in India", canonical: "https://www.mbbsadmissionsinabroad.com/difference-of-studying-mbbs-in-ukraine-vs-india-for-indian-students", meta: { charset: "utf-8", name: { keywords: "Difference of Studying MBBS in Ukraine Vs India for Indian Students", }, }, }; return (

Difference of Studying MBBS in Ukraine Vs India for Indian Students

  • Differentiate between Universities
  • Cost of Education
  • Advantage for Indian Students
  • Cost of Living
  • PG in Ukraine vs India
  • Scope After MBBS in Ukraine vs India
  • Studying MBBS in Ukraine or India is Worth it or Not
  • Conclusion

MBBS is a valued degree across the world and it is totally worth to study MBBS with the top MCI approved medical universities in different countries. Ukraine and India are the top destinations to study MBBS. Indian students that wish to study MBBS in Ukraine or MBBS in India can take a look at the detailed analysis of studying MBBS in both the countries and choose for themselves the most viable option.

{/* */}

Differentiate between Universities

MBBS in Ukraine medical universities

Ukraine is one of the popular places among Indian students for pursuing MBBS course because of the world-class Government Medical Universities providing MBBS course at a very affordable fee. After completing MBBS in Ukraine, the students can apply for a job in any country.

The students can take direct admission to pursue MBBS in Ukraine medical colleges/universities as there is no requirement to give any entrance test. Each Ukraine medical universities are approved by the MCI, WHO, and UNESCO. The medical degree acquired from Ukraine medical colleges/universities is globally accepted. They also have reasonable tuition fee with a top-class education system.

MBBS in India medical universities

Around 6 lakhs students apply to MBBS in India medical universities every year but some of them can occupy seat in the top Indian medical universities. This is because of tough competition and limited seats. That’s the reason most Indian students choose opt abroad universities and several students take admission to MBBS in Ukraine because of high-quality education at reasonable fees.

India is a beautiful place that comprises of 362 medical institutions and top of them are Harvard or Cambridge university that provide MBBS course. Most of the overseas medical students take admission in the top Indian medical universities. The duration of MBBS in India is 5.5 years including a 1-year paid internship. The medical degree provided by the Indian medical colleges to the medical students is approved by the MCI and Government Authorities of India.

Cost of Education

The cost of education of MBBS in Ukraine vs India is as follows:

Country Fee structure per year
India 5 lakhs to 20 lakhs
Ukraine 20 lakhs to 25 lakhs

Advantage for Indian Students

Advantages for Indian students to study MBBS in Ukraine:

  • Ukraine medical universities provide high-quality medical education to students.
  • The students do not require paying any donation fee or capitation fee to take admission to MBBS course in Ukraine medical college.
  • The best professors of Ukraine medical college/university encourage the students to take part in various seminars and international conferences to get more knowledge.
  • The medical degree from Ukraine medical universities are recognized by WHO, UNESCO, MCI.
  • The medium of coaching MBBS in Ukraine is English that enables the students to communicate with others in the campus.
  • The cost of living in the hostel of Ukraine medical colleges is very low as compared to other countries.
Cost of Living

Cost of living in Ukraine

The cost of living in Ukraine is very reasonable as compared to many other countries. Ukraine is a gorgeous country and has a study environment that boosts the students in their career. Ukraine medical colleges/universities provide wonderful accommodation facilities such as hostels for Indian students with all facilities and amenities and with Indian food as well.

The cost of living in India is quite cheap as compared to many other countries. The cost of living in India depends on the place the students live in India which is approx 5000 to 15000 per month. Various top Indian medical universities also offer hostel facilities to the students at very affordable fees.

PG in Ukraine vs India

Following are the PG options after completing MBBS in Ukraine:

  • There are lots of options to students after competing MBBS in Ukraine such as studying PG course.
  • The MBBS students can start his/her career as a surgeon in any country as the medical degree they obtained from Ukraine medical colleges are recognized worldwide.
  • They can pursue Post Graduation course in their own field in India or Ukraine or any other country but they have to qualify the entrance exam or screening test of that country or university.

Following are the PG options after completing MBBS in India:

  • The students can do MS or any diploma once they complete MBBS in India.
  • They can take admission in India or abroad to pursue post-graduation in internal medicine/general surgery/gynecology/pediatrics.
  • They need to qualify NEET entrance exam, PGIMER, JIPMER PG, and AIIMS PG to pursue MS or any diploma in India.
Scope After MBBS in Ukraine vs India

Scope after MBBS in Ukraine

  • The students can take admission in masters in Medicine
  • Once they complete MBBS in Ukraine and after qualify MCI screening test can do medicine practice in India.
  • They can do a job in any hospital of any country because the MBBS degree is recognized worldwide.

Scope after MBBS in India

  • After completing MBBS in India, the students can do job in both private and public sectors such as biomedical companies, healthcare sector, research institutes, laboratories, medical colleges with higher salary package.
  • They can start their career by building their own healthcare clinic.
  • They can plan to do job in abroad because of high demand of Indian doctors in foreign countries with high salary package.
Studying MBBS in Ukraine or India is Worth it or Not

Ukraine has become one of the famous destinations among Indian students who want to pursue their MBBS from abroad. Ukraine comprises several top-class Medical Colleges/Universities that provide MBBS, MD, and other degrees in medicine at reasonable fees. The students who complete their MBBS from these universities are eligible to apply for a job in any part of the world. The medium of instruction in the top university for MBBS in Ukraine is English and provides high-quality facilities to the students.

India is also one of the best considerable places among students to pursue MBBS. MBBS in India has the highest-ranked for offering training and research programs. If the students wish to apply MBBS in India, they have to qualify the NEET Entrance. After completing the MBBS in India, the medical degree awarded to the students is known as Bachelor of Medicine or Bachelor of Surgery.

Conclusion

We have provided detailed information regarding MBBS in Ukraine and MBBS in India. The students can choose any country as per their interest and budget. After completing MBBS in Ukraine, the students need to qualify MCI screening test to practice medicine in India but there are no rules and regulations to qualify any exam in case of MBBS in India.

Dr Vinit Kumar is a Educational Consultant for India & Abroad with more than 18 Years of Experience. He has an extensive background guiding & assisting medical students to find the best university as per their budget. ✔3500+ Students ✔15 Countries ✔MBBS, MBA, PG, UG ✔100% Commitment ✔Education Loan ✔Job Placements
) } export default DifferenceMbbsInUkraineVsIndia;
